room_title: Escape room "The Secret Gallery (Quest to the Forbidden Temple)" by Dynamic Escape Rooms in Phoenix
room_address: 1797 W University Dr, Suite 168, Tempe AZ 85281
room_description: CHAPTER 1: THE SECRET GALLERY It's said that the legendary mystical stones of the Forbidden Temple have been lost for over two centuries. Word has reached you that nefarious multi-billionaire and self-proclaimed genius Prof. Hans Grubber has acquired a couple of them. You suspect he is hiding them in a secret gallery located under his most remote mansion. Your mission wonâ€™t be easy. You and your team must break into the mansion, gain access to the gallery and recover the sacred stones. Connect all the dots to outsmart Grubber's evil genius and steal back the sacred objects that will put you one step closer to the Forbidden Temple.
